block.p: SENTER--Ida, on March 15, 2007. Wife of Abe Senter; deceased. Mother of Harriett Beyer (Harvey), Maxine Gilbert (Marvin). Grandmother of five; Stephen Beyer (Lori), Ester Ann Causanschi (Allan), Cynthia Pattison (Jeffrey), Richard Gilbert (Sharone), Michael Beyer (Caryn). Great-grandmother of 12; Hillary Causanschi, Brooke Fleischman (Michael), Phillip Beyer, Rebecca Beyer, Alexander Pattison, Mara Pattison, Benjamin Gilbert, Dylan Beyer, Cole Beyer, Samuel Gilbert, Zachary Gilbert, Emma Gilbert. A woman of valour. Matriarchof a close, loving family. Ma, we love you. Rest in peace.

A woman of valour. Matriarchof a close, loving family. Ma, we love you. Rest in peace.
